titles: The Particular grieuances of those His Maiesties subiects throughout England and Wales, which lye vnder the oppression of George Woods patent for the sole printing vpon linnen cloth
notes: Imprint information supplied from STC (2nd ed.).
Petition to Parliament from those disadvantaged by the patent.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
keywords: Linen industry --  England --  Early works to 1800.
Textile crafts --  England --  Early works to 1800.
